name: Master of Ski
description:
It's time to do some sports!

The Master of Ski game is the true core of adrenaline, is a casual game, but not like all. Get rid of fear and complexex :) Your mission is to bypass houses, fir trees, even those who race without accidents to reach the end.

Accumulate speed while skiing and you will truly know what it means to be free.

Game features :
- Reaching of the best score
- Unpredictable route
- Speed and adrenaline
- Coins collector
